greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1, a(n) = sigma(n) if sigma(n) >= a(n-1), otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + sigma(n).
formula: a(n) = A024916(n) - 8 and A160664(n) - 9, for n > 3. - _Greg Dresden_, Feb 23 2020
results.author: _Jon Perry_, Mar 22 2004
